briefdescription.para: Initialising the data structure for path planning.
Get the angle value after path planning.
Get the next angle value after path planning.
Get the last angle value after path planning.
Get whether the curve is complete or not.

simplesect.para: true The generation of the current curve has been completed
false Current curve generation in progress

briefdescription.para: Generate trapezoidal curves, which need to be called periodically, at the same time as the loop_ts configuration.
